titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Allegheny County Committee 1960 White House Conference on Children and Youth Subcommittee on Education Records, 1959-1962 AIS.1982.24

did.unittitle: Allegheny County Committee 1960 White House Conference on Children and Youth Subcommittee on Education Records

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Allegheny County Committee 1960 White House Conference on Children and Youth. Subcommittee on Education

did.abstract: The call for the sixth White House Conference on Children and Youth (1960) was issued by President Dwight D. Eisenhower on May 27, 1958. On June 26, 1959, Governor David L. Lawrence appointed a State Coordinating Committee to be responsible for the White House Conference preparations in Pennsylvania. This collection includes agendas, announcements, correspondence, invitations, membership lists, memoranda, minutes and reports.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: The call for the sixth White House Conference on Children and Youth (1960) was issued by President Dwight D. Eisenhower on May 27, 1958. On June 26, 1959, Governor David L. Lawrence appointed a State Coordinating Committee to be responsible for the White House Conference preparations in Pennsylvania.

Members of the Governor's coordinating committee from Allegheny County served as a steering committee for Allegheny County and invited about 300 local leaders to participate in the preparation of the Allegheny County report. Nine subcommittee chairmen were appointed primarily for editing, public relations and interpretation. The areas selected for exploration were: family life, substitute family care, delinquency education, mental health and youth employment. Professional consultants (secretaries) were also appointed to each subcommittee.

The records of the Subcommittee on Education were deposited in the Archives in 1982 by Mrs. Sylvan Libson, Chairman. This collection includes agendas, announcements, correspondence, invitations, membership lists, memoranda, minutes and reports from 1959-1962. The correspondence reflects the organization of the Subcommittee on Education and the development of its recommendations.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Donated by Mrs. Sylvan Libson in 1982.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was processed by Archives Service Center staff in 1982.

Revision and rearrangement for the encoded version of the finding aid provided by Michael O'Malley on December 12, 2002. Information about the collection title and the controlled access terms was extracted from the MARC record in the University of Pittsburgh catalog Voyager ID number: 142174.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: Permission for publication is given on behalf of the University of Pittsburgh as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission of the copyright holder, which must also be obtained.
